languages.text: {n}Обыгрывать Джай совсем не сложно — она охотно отдает фигуры, делая, казалось бы, глупые ошибки. Настоящим испытанием оказывается сохранить здравость рассудка после очередной "победной" стопки.{/n}

{n}Jae makes mistake after mistake, and you quickly gain the upper hand. As she surrenders her pieces left and right, you soon realise the hardest part of the game is keeping a clear head as you drink the shots for each claimed piece.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Обыгрывать Джай совсем не сложно — она охотно отдает фигуры, делая, казалось бы, глупые ошибки. Настоящим испытанием оказывается сохранить здравость рассудка после очередной "победной" стопки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You easily gain the upper hand on Jae — she is surrendering her pieces left and right by making seemingly elementary mistakes. The hard part is holding on to your soundness of mind after claiming yet another "captured" shot.{/n}

{n}You easily gain the upper hand on Jae — she is surrendering her pieces left and right by making seemingly elementary mistakes. The hard part is holding on to your soundness of mind after claiming yet another "captured" shot.{/n}

{n}Jae makes mistake after mistake, and you quickly gain the upper hand. As she surrenders her pieces left and right, you soon realise the hardest part of the game is keeping a clear head as you drink the shots for each claimed piece.{/n}

{n}Jae makes mistake after mistake, and you quickly gain the upper hand. As she surrenders her pieces left and right, you soon realise the hardest part of the game is keeping a clear head as you drink the shots for each claimed piece.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae enchaîne les erreurs, ce qui vous permet de prendre rapidement le dessus. Alors qu'elle perd ses pièces l'une après l'autre, vous réalisez bientôt que le plus difficile dans ce jeu, c'est de rester lucide tout en buvant le contenu de chaque verre capturé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae makes mistake after mistake, and you quickly gain the upper hand. As she surrenders her pieces left and right, you soon realise the hardest part of the game is keeping a clear head as you drink the shots for each claimed piece.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae enchaîne les erreurs, ce qui vous permet de prendre rapidement le dessus. Alors qu'elle perd ses pièces l'une après l'autre, vous réalisez bientôt que le plus difficile dans ce jeu, c'est de rester lucide tout en buvant le contenu de chaque verre capturé.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae comete un error tras otro y no tardas en obtener la ventaja. Según pierde piezas, te das cuenta de que lo más difícil del juego es mantener la cabeza despejada con tanto chupito.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae makes mistake after mistake, and you quickly gain the upper hand. As she surrenders her pieces left and right, you soon realise the hardest part of the game is keeping a clear head as you drink the shots for each claimed piece.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae comete un error tras otro y no tardas en obtener la ventaja. Según pierde piezas, te das cuenta de que lo más difícil del juego es mantener la cabeza despejada con tanto chupito.{/n}

languages.text: {n}婕伊走错了好几步棋，你很快就占了上风。当你吃掉婕伊的棋子时，你猛然意识到，这个游戏最难的部分在于一边喝酒，一边保持头脑清醒。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae makes mistake after mistake, and you quickly gain the upper hand. As she surrenders her pieces left and right, you soon realise the hardest part of the game is keeping a clear head as you drink the shots for each claimed piece.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊走错了好几步棋，你很快就占了上风。当你吃掉婕伊的棋子时，你猛然意识到，这个游戏最难的部分在于一边喝酒，一边保持头脑清醒。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ジェイは次々とミスを犯し、あなたはすぐに優勢に立った。彼女が右往左往しながら駒を放棄していく中、ゲームの最も難しい部分は、駒を得た度にショットを飲むこと、そして冷静さを保つことなんだと、すぐに気が付いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae makes mistake after mistake, and you quickly gain the upper hand. As she surrenders her pieces left and right, you soon realise the hardest part of the game is keeping a clear head as you drink the shots for each claimed piece.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは次々とミスを犯し、あなたはすぐに優勢に立った。彼女が右往左往しながら駒を放棄していく中、ゲームの最も難しい部分は、駒を得た度にショットを飲むこと、そして冷静さを保つことなんだと、すぐに気が付いた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae macht einen Fehler nach dem anderen, und du gewinnst bald die Oberhand. Während sie eine Spielfigur nach der anderen verliert, erkennst du bald, dass das Schwierigste an diesem Spiel ist, einen klaren Kopf zu bewahren, wenn du für jede eroberte Figur trinken musst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae makes mistake after mistake, and you quickly gain the upper hand. As she surrenders her pieces left and right, you soon realise the hardest part of the game is keeping a clear head as you drink the shots for each claimed piece.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae macht einen Fehler nach dem anderen, und du gewinnst bald die Oberhand. Während sie eine Spielfigur nach der anderen verliert, erkennst du bald, dass das Schwierigste an diesem Spiel ist, einen klaren Kopf zu bewahren, wenn du für jede eroberte Figur trinken musst.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae, hata üstüne hata yapıyor. Kısa sürede üstünlüğü ele geçiriyorsun. Sürekli taş kaybediyor ve çok geçmeden fark ediyorsun ki bu oyunun en zor kısmı, aldığın her taştan sonra şat içip ayık kalabilmek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae makes mistake after mistake, and you quickly gain the upper hand. As she surrenders her pieces left and right, you soon realise the hardest part of the game is keeping a clear head as you drink the shots for each claimed piece.{/n}
